transcript:
Customer: Hello IndiaMART.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan bolo. Yes. A very good evening. Good morning sir. Kahan se? Yes sir, kahan se baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Main Gujarat se baat kar raha hun aur woh mera kya woh PNS number chalu kar do aisa bolna hai mere ko aapko.
Executive: Sir kis company se baat kar rahe hain aap? Company kya hai aapki?
Customer: Khodiyal Bandhani.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Aur kuch boliye aapko jo puchna hai. Matlab woh PNS number active kar do kya bolte hain use.
Executive: PNS number sir.
Customer: Haan woh active kar do abhi tak band hai woh.
Executive: Okay, abhi ek minute check karti hun. Aap line pe rahiye.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Okay.

Customer: Aale kya hua?


Executive: Hello sir.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Ji aap na sir, yeh jo hai PNS number active hai ek baar main dekhiye ek baar number bata deti hun aapko kaun sa add hai. Theek hai? Ek baar number bata deti hun.
Customer: Boliye. Ji boliye.
Executive: Ji sir, aap line pe rahiyega main check kar rahi hun.
Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Sir aapke na PNS mein do number hain. Isme last mein jo three digit hai 365. Theek hai? Aur dusri hai sir 987.
Customer: Hmm. Haan toh mere ko 365 wala chahiye number. Dono active kar do dono mera hi number. Dono mera hi number hai.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes sir. Hello.
Customer: Woh 365 wala active kar do dono mera hi number hai.
Executive: Okay. Sir jaise ki main check kar rahi thi active hai sir yeh toh.
Executive: Abhi sir dekhiye abhi na abhi aapki services live hui hai na. Thoda time lagega. Thoda visibility badhne mein hai na. Dekhiye main jaise check kar rahi hun aapko 12 inquiries aayi hain. Inquiries toh aapko aana start ho gayi hain. Theek hai? Aap jo hai aur buyleads vagerah consume kijiye toh aapko calls aana bhi start ho jayega sir. Theek hai na? Thoda sa time lagega sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji sir woh active hai maine check kiya. Dono number active hai sir.
Customer: Ji. Okay. Aur sir ji aur sir jaise ki abhi main check kar rahi thi sir actually aapne na only customer care pe call kiya tha. Aap na mera number save kar lijiye koi bhi dikkat ho na toh aap mere ko connect kar lijiye. Hai na? Yeh mera hi number hai.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Kaun kaun sa hai?
Executive: Ji. Sir yeh mera hi number hai. Aap is number ko save kar lijiye. Aap matlab customer care mein aap call mat kijiye ga kyunki aap vahan se bhi mere paas hi query redirect hota hai.
Customer: Aapka number kya hai?
Executive: Ji. Aapka number aapka number.
Executive: Ji. Main keh rahi hun koi bhi concern ho aapko koi bhi dikkat ho toh aap mere ko hi call kijiye. Customer care mein call mat kijiye ga. Isi number pe mere number pe call kijiye ga aap. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan par aapka number batao mere ko.
Executive: Ji. Aur sir jaise ki main check kar rahi thi ki sir aapka jo hai aapne call kiya hai na toh aapka concern bhi open tha abhi. Hai na? Uh. Sir yeh jo product pe discussion vagerah hua abhi sir chiffon dupatta mein bhi ki bhi aapne kuch buyleads consume kari hai. Chiffon dupatta mein deal karte hain aap sir?
Customer: Rayon Bandhani dupatta mein. Aapki mein aapko meri aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Ji sir mere ko aawaz aa rahi hai aapki. Jaise ki main check kar rahi thi. Sir jaise ki na main check kar rahi thi aapne chiffon dupatta se mein bhi kuch buyleads consume kari hai toh chiffon dupatta mein deal karte hain sir aap?
Customer: Woh mere ko sir padha likha nahi hun jyada. Mere ko sirf woh number active karne ke liye woh mein bola tha.
Executive: Okay. Isme yeh deal nahi kaha jo hai aap. Theek hai.
Customer: Are okay. Aap woh chodiye mere ko woh kya aap bol rahe hain customer care mein call mat kijiye toh main kis mein call karu aapka number dijiye main vahi bol raha hun.
Executive: Ji. Main na sir aapko apne number se na ek baar whatsapp kar dungi aapko. Theek hai na?
Customer: Okay okay. Toh aap mere hi number pe aap call kijiye ga. Aur sir abhi na aapke paas ek mail aayega.
Customer: Okay. Theek hai? Toh mail pe aap jo hai aapka vaise resolution toh aapko provide kar diya hai maine. Hai na? Matlab samadhan jo aapka PNS number active hai sir koi issue nahi hai usme. Theek hai? Toh aap sir aapko jo hai feedback aayega toh feedback pe sir aap jo hai feedback de dijiyega sir aap. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Ji. Okay sir. Abhi na main aapko thodi der mein abhi back call karti hun jab main mail share karungi toh. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay okay. Okay sir. Okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to activate PNS number.

- Customer wants executive's direct contact number.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed both PNS numbers are active.

- Executive will share her contact number on WhatsApp.

- Executive informed customer about feedback process.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share her contact number on WhatsApp.

- Executive will call back after sharing the mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- pns number, activation, customer care, whatsapp
